doc.name: PteraController
doc.description:
This controller is used in every Ptera modal model. It contains an ptolemy.domains.ptera.kernel.PteraDirector to execute the events in it.

Each Ptera modal model has one or more Ptera controllers. One of those controllers is the top level controller, which can be obtained with getController(). The other controllers are refinements of events.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: A Boolean parameter that decides whether simultaneous events should be placed in the event queue in the last-in-first-out (LIFO) fashion or not.
